word: THE COURSE OF THESE "OPPOSERS OF THE TRUTH" WAS SOON RUN. BOTH STEPHENSON AND HALL LOST THEIR REASON. THE MESSENGER OF TRUTH CEASED PUBLICATION IN 1857, AND EARLY IN 1858 ELDER WHITE REPORTED REGARDING THE PARTY: "NOT ONE OF THE EIGHTEEN MESSENGERS OF WHICH THEY ONCE BOASTED AS BEING WITH THEM IS NOW BEARING A PUBLIC TESTIMONY, AND NOT ONE PLACE OF REGULAR MEETING OF OUR KNOWLEDGE AMONG THEM."--REVIEW AND HERALD, JAN. 14, 1858.
